basic.name: Snipe (Q)
basic.description: Deal 230 damage to the first enemy hit.Passive: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 6%, stacking up to 30%. Gain an additional 25% damage bonus at maximum stacks. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

basic.name: Pinning Shot (W)
basic.description: Deal 100 damage to an enemy and Slow them by 40% for 2.25 seconds.

basic.name: Holo Decoy (E)
basic.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds with 100% of Nova's current Health that attacks enemies, dealing 10% of Nova's base damage. Whenever a Decoy takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

basic.name: Ghost Protocol (?)
basic.description: Activate to instantly grant Stealth to Nova and spawn a Holo Decoy at her location. Nova is Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds when Stealthed by Ghost Protocol.

heroic.name: Triple Tap (R)
heroic.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 damage each.

heroic.name: Precision Strike (R)
heroic.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

trait.name: Permanent Cloak (T)
trait.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.Passive: Gain 15% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

1.name: Longshot
1.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

1.name: Covert Ops
1.description: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 60% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

1.name: Advanced Cloaking
1.description: After being Stealthed for 1 second, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 6 Mana per second.

4.name: Rapid Projection
4.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 60%.

4.name: Holo Stability
4.description: Increase the cast range of Holo Decoy by 100% and its duration by 120%.Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Ghost Protocol by 15 seconds.

4.name: Covert Mission
4.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

7.name: Perfect Shot
7.description: Hitting an enemy with Snipe reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds and refunds half its Mana cost, doubled against enemy Heroes.

7.name: One in the Chamber
7.description: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 65% additional damage.

7.name: Anti-Armor Shells
7.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 15 for 4 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

10.name: Triple Tap
10.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 damage each.

10.name: Precision Strike
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

13.name: Psionic Efficiency
13.description: Snipe's range is increased by 15% and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.

13.name: Double Tap
13.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Ionic Force Field
13.description: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.

16.name: Explosive Round
16.description: Snipe also deals 90% damage to enemies near the impact.

16.name: Crippling Shot
16.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

16.name: Lethal Decoy
16.description: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30% of Nova's damage.

20.name: Fast Reload
20.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

20.name: Precision Barrage
20.description: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds.

20.name: Apollo Suit
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
